mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, viewcnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES (notice_seq.nextval, #{topview}, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewcnt}, #{word}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, viewcnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notice ORDER BY noticeno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM notice WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')

SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, viewcnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, r FROM ( SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, viewcnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, viewcnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notice WHERE (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%') ORDER BY noticeno DESC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
SELECT noticeno, topview, memberno, title, content, viewcnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM notice WHERE noticeno = #{noticeno}
